author: cts.com.tw
title: 追捕毒販侵害瓜地馬拉領土主權 墨西哥政府致歉 - 華視新聞網
text:
中央社
（中央社記者李登文瓜地馬拉市11日專電）墨西哥警方日前因追捕販毒集團，擅自進入瓜地馬拉境內並且爆發槍戰，造成一名瓜國士兵受傷。此舉已侵犯他國主權引起外交爭議，而事隔2天，墨西哥政府公開致歉。
隸屬墨西哥奇亞帕斯州政府（Chiapas）的快速反應特警部隊（Fuerza de Reaccion Inmediata Pakal，FRIP），8日在追捕販毒集團成員時未經授權越境，進入瓜地馬拉與墨西哥接壤的維維特南戈（Huehuetenango）邊境城鎮梅西利亞（La Mesilla）與販毒集團成員爆發槍戰，並擊斃4名嫌犯。
墨西哥警方的行為不只擅入他國領土，奇亞帕斯州長拉米雷斯（Eduardo Ramirez）還發表言論，暗示瓜地馬拉當局與毒品走私集團，暗中勾結存在不當關係，引爆瓜國各界眾怒。瓜地馬拉總統阿雷瓦洛（Bernardo Arévalo）及外交部都向墨西哥政府提出正式抗議，因此舉明顯侵犯瓜國主權。
眼見爭議上升成外交事件，墨西哥總統薛恩鮑姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）10日公開表示遺憾，並要求徹查並懲處當時越境行動的警方人員。墨西哥外交部隨後也發表聲明，正式向瓜地馬拉政府致歉，重申將致力於捍衛領土主權、尊重國際法、加強合作機制以強化兩國邊界的安全。
而因不當發言被各界批評的拉米雷斯，也隨後在社群平台X發文認錯，並且向被冒犯的人表達最誠摯的歉意。
瓜國媒體「自由新聞報」（Prensa Libre）11日報導，類似的越境衝突事件，去年就曾發生，過去幾十年來也有，凸顯瓜地馬拉和墨西哥在安全和國防問題上缺乏協調機制。報導也引述國際關係學者評論指出，墨西哥警方不只侵犯瓜地馬拉國家主權，更違反「聯合國憲章」所確立的國際規範和原則。
而槍戰發生在人口密集的城鎮商業區，也危及平民生命。墨西哥警方缺乏行動協調，不遵守相關規程，墨國政府除了要徹查，兩國政府高層更應該研擬一份聯合或雙邊聲明，確保類似事件不再發生。此外，瓜地馬拉內政部和國防部也應該要有其維護國家主權的憲法義務。
這次發生越境衝突的地點，是墨瓜民眾往來最頻繁的區域之一，也同樣成為販毒集團活動的熱點。瓜地馬拉國防部去年就發起「火環行動」（Cinturon de Fuego），在邊境地區部署重兵，設置陸空檢查站以及包括無人機和直升機的空中監控，軍隊甚至配備裝甲車輛，打擊毒品和武器走私，還有人口販運的非法行為。
但有媒體指出，透過事發當時的監控畫面，在越境交火的12分鐘內，瓜地馬拉警方反應十分被動，並未出手制止墨西哥警方和販毒集團之間的衝突。雖然瓜國警方表示因為擔心傷及無辜平民，所以沒有介入槍戰，但是否善盡「守土有責」也引發質疑。（編輯：張芷瑄）1140612
新聞來源：中央社

author: Raphael Salomão
title: Alerta vermelho: veja quais cidades de SP e RJ terão as chuvas mais intensas
text:
A região Sudeste entrou em alerta máximo para a ocorrência de temporais em diversas localidades, especialmente em São Paulo e no Rio de Janeiro . Uma frente fria, que já causou temporais e estragos no Sul do país, pode levar ao acúmulo de mais de 200 milímetros de chuvas apenas entre esta sexta-feira (22/3) e sábado (23/3), com risco de alagamentos e deslizamentos de terra em áreas mais vulneráveis.
+ Saiba a previsão para sua região e sua propriedade na ferramenta exclusiva de clima da Globo Rural
Em São Paulo, as chuvas serão mais intensas nesta sexta-feira, ainda quem devam continuar ao longo dos próximos dias. Nesta sexta, um dos municípios mais chuvosos será Cruzeiro , no Vale do Paraíba, onde o volume de precipitações deverá chegar perto de 100 milímetros. Já no Rio de Janeiro, a previsão é de chuva intensa principalmente em Angra dos Reis , na Costa Verde, Quatis, no Vale do Paraíba Fluminense, e Mesquita , no Grande Rio.
Veja Mais Veja a seguir algumas das cidades em que mais deve chover nos dos dois Estados.
São Paulo
De acordo com a Defesa Civil do Estado de São Paulo, o volume de chuvas nesta sexta no Litoral Norte e no Vale do Paraíba deve ser de mais de 250 milímetros. Nessas duas regiões, o município que deve registrar as chuvas mais intensas é Cruzeiro, a 220 quilômetros da capital, onde a previsão indica o acúmulo de 96 milímetros de precipitações, de acordo com a plataforma de monitoramento de clima FieldPRO.
Cruzeiro (SP)

Em Lavrinhas, município vizinho de Cruzeiro, as chuvas desta sexta podem chegar a 85 milímetros, segundo a FieldPRO.
Previsão do tempo para Lavrinhas (SP) — Foto: Reprodução Rio Grande da Serra (SP)
As chuvas também deverão ser intensas na região metropolitana de São Paulo. Nessa área, a cidade com o maior volume de precipitações deverá ser Rio Grande da Serra, onde o volume poderá chegar a 38 milímetros, de acordo com a FieldPRO.
A capital paulista, por sua vez, deverá registrar 11 milímetros de chuvas nesta sexta.
Previsão do tempo para Rio Grande da Serra (SP) — Foto: Reprodução Itanhaém (SP)
Na Baixada Santista, as chuvas serão particularmente intensas no município de Itanhaém, onde o volume deverá chegar a 46 milímetros. Já Santos , cidade onde fica o maior terminal portuário da América Latina, deve ter 41 milímetros de precipitações ao longo da sexta-feira.
Previsão do tempo para Itanhaém (SP) — Foto: Reprodução A Defesa Civil de São Paulo prevê forte chuva também no Vale do Ribeira e em diversas outras localidades no interior do Estado. No Rio de Janeiro, a chamada costa verde é uma das regiões que estão em estado de alerta. Nessa faixa do litoral fluminense, Angra dos Reis é o município em que as chuvas serão mais intensas: entre sexta e sábado, o volume de chuvas na cidade passará de 100 milímetros, informa a FieldPRO. Serão 82 milímetros na sexta e 23 no dia seguinte.

A região serrana do Rio é outra que entrou em estado de alerta para as chuvas dos próximos dias. Em Petrópolis, serão 52 milímetros de precipitações nesta sexta, principalmente no fim do dia, e outros 43 no sábado, segundo a plataforma FieldPRO.
Previsão do tempo para Petrópolis (RJ) — Foto: Reprodução Quatis (RJ)
O Vale do Paraíba Fluminense, assim como o paulista, vai registrar chuvas intensas nos próximos dias. Nessa região do Estado do Rio, o quadro mais preocupante é o de Quatis, a 145 quilômetros da capital, onde haverá o acúmulo de 90 milímetros de chuvas nesta sexta e de 15 milímetros no sábado.

author: Matt Solomon
title: Seth MacFarlane Says Ted and Peter Griffin Allow Him to Push Whatever Boundaries He Wants | Cracked.com
text: Seth MacFarlane Says Ted and Peter Griffin Allow Him to Push Whatever Boundaries He Wants Look at the big man hiding behind the teddy bear! Seth MacFarlane probably wouldn’t mind if you teased him about his cuddly comedy bodyguard. [In a conversation with Collider](https://collider.com/ted-series-seth-mafarlane/), MacFarlane admits that his make-believe characters like [ Family Guy’s Peter Griffin](https://www.cracked.com/article_38711_12-family-guy-jokes-that-were-bad-from-the-get-go.html) and [toy bear Ted](https://www.cracked.com/article_40386_no-country-loves-ted-quite-like-this-one.html) (soon to return in a new coming-of-age series) allow him to get away with outrageous gags that might cancel an ordinary human. [Click right here to get the best of Cracked sent to your inbox.](https://www.cracked.com/newsletters?utm_source=web&utm_medium=intro&utm_campaign=crdintro) Buckle up, snowflakes, because MacFarlane knows Peter and Ted give him license to push comedy boundaries. “Where I have a little bit more of a safety net is that if you're a stand-up comic or if you are somebody who is the face of their show every week, then if you screw up, and if you have a joke that goes too far for people, you're gonna be the one who gets attacked,” MacFarlane says. “With Family Guy and with Ted, first of all, these are animated characters — Ted does not exist, Peter Griffin doesn't exist. You can't tweet at him.” For extra protection, MacFarlane finds safety in numbers. Today’s viewers “are smart enough to know it's a lot of people that have to get together and decide what goes on the air,” he says. “Television is very much a group effort, and people are savvy at this point. They know that. And so, for me, it kind of protects me in a way that maybe gives me a little bit of an unfair advantage, because these are animated characters.” With his new Ted series, MacFarlane is looking to bring back the offensive -- or at least right up to the edge of offensive. “There's an absence of flat-out hard comedy these days, a comedy that's just out to get laughs, that's out to explore the boundaries of the genre and see if there's an edge that takes it too far,” he says. “It's kind of fun to find where that edge is and make sure you don't go past it, but to go right up to the rim.” Does your average viewer even get that offended by shocking punchlines? MacFarlane says no, wagering that the most outraged people are amplified by sites looking for clickbait. “I don't think the actual audiences are quite as representative of that kind of noise as we might be led to believe,” he says. As much as MacFarlane hopes to push boundaries with his new Ted series, there’s not much in comedy that makes his blood boil. “I don't get mad when I see things that cross the line in fiction,” he says. “When I read the news, and I see anything with the phrase ‘Texas Supreme Court,’ then I get pissed. Then I get angry. There's nothing that I can think of for me in this show that goes over the line comedically.”

title: El ALIMENTO IDEAL para reducir el COLESTEROL y evitar ENFERMEDADES: est\u00e1 lleno de PROBI\u00d3TICOS, VITAMINA E y GR
text:
El alimento ideal para reducir el colesterol y evitar enfermedades: está lleno de probióticos, vitamina E y grasas saludables
Es un fruto delicioso, saludable e ideal para incluir en un sinfín de preparaciones. Aquí te contamos de qué se trata.
Los expertos de la [salud](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1314752&s=ddda3435862cd364dbc01a93a5bf0b7b) coinciden en que la alimentación que llevamos impacta directamente en nuestro organismo, ya sea para bien o para mal. En ese sentido, elegir ingredientes nutritivos y combinarlos entre sí es una de las mejores estrategias para preservar nuestro [bienestar](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1314061&s=05a6041ef14e49fce5068b07db02bcb3) general.
Así, al hablar de [alimentos](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1179490&s=4c0c8c2c7255ddbf64206062f5f59c09) destacado perfil nutricional, existe uno que, entre su amplia lista de compuestos beneficiosos, ofrece vitamina E, probióticos y grasas saludables.
Además, es la estrella de millones de platillos sumamente populares a nivel mundial y ofrece grandes ventajas para regular el [colesterol](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1314231&s=2ddaa10691df6fb8d85350affc96182a) y evitar [enfermedades](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1309843&s=bbd53c97f30a5a758466e7be297d5df3). Aquí te contamos de qué se trata.
[¿Fin de la humanidad? La primera profecía de Los Simpson que no se cumplió](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1314982&s=97eda72df374b699da0a07115831d722)
[Adiós al Vaticano: el papa Francisco rezó por el "desamparo" y llamó a todos sus fieles](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1315034&s=51e2a4a0aeb2f236a20f9e1f8b57b189)
El alimento ideal para reducir el colesterol y evitar enfermedades
El aguacate, también conocido como el "oro verde de México" es una fruta de sabor suave, abundante pulpa e increíbles propiedades.
De acuerdo con una [publicación](https://nutritionsource.hsph.harvard.edu/avocados/) de la Facultad de Salud Pública de Harvard el aguacate es fuente de grasas (mayormente monoinsaturadas), fibra, vitaminas del complejo B, vitamina C, vitamina E, vitamina K, folato, potasio, magnesio y carotenoides.
En cuanto a sus beneficios para la salud del organismo, la universidad señala que varios de los nutrientes presentes en el aguacate, como las grasas monoinsaturadas, el potasio y la fibra "se han asociado con un menor riesgo de enfermedades crónicas, especialmente cuando se incluyen como parte de una dieta nutritiva y equilibrada".
Se explica en esa línea que diversos estudios muestran una reducción del colesterol LDL, mejor conocido como "[colesterol malo](/tools/redirect.php?t=3&i=1223338&s=ea3dfe04e60fdeb54ffc4a37f9df4654)" al sustituir otros tipos de grasas en la dieta por aguacates.
Además, las fibras de estos frutos actúan como prebióticos y, de acuerdo con lo señalado por Harvard, mejoran la diversidad de la microflora en el colon. "Estas bacterias digieren y descomponen las fibras en ácidos grasos de cadena corta, que se investigan activamente por su papel en la prevención de enfermedades crónicas", afirma la universidad.
Cómo consumir este alimento repleto de nutrientes
Como mencionamos, una de las cualidades más destacadas del aguacate es su capacidad de actuar como comodín en cualquier platillo. Aquí te brindamos algunas ideas

author: Kristofer Purnell
title: John Arcilla, Karen Davila back Leonardo DiCaprio's support for Masungi | Philstar.com
text:
MANILA, Philippines — A number of Filipino celebrities called for the protection of the Masungi Geopark Project after Oscar winner Leonardo DiCaprio expressed support and asked for presidential intervention.
DiCaprio posted on his official Instagram account images of forest rangers in Masungi who protect the critical areas plagued by illegal activities.
"Conservation successes like Masungi serve as a reminder that the Philippines can become a leader in sustainability, eco-tourism, biodiversity protection, and climate action," the actor said.
He noted that the Department of Environment and Natural Resources (DENR) threatens to cancel the agreement that protects Masungi from prolific land grabbing activities, which would "set back the success of an internationally acclaimed conservation effort and leave the area vulnerable again" to illegal land works.
The actor even tagged President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos to intervene and continue to protect Masungi.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Leonardo DiCaprio (@leonardodicaprio)
Several local celebrities like fellow award-winning actor John Arcilla and journalist Karen Davila thanked DiCaprio for joining the Masungi protection calls.
"Thank you so much for this awareness and call Leonardo; such a noble endeavor, it's a pity that most Filipinos ourselves are not even aware of this," commented Arcilla.
Davila went on to praise the Masungi Georeserve Foundation Inc. (MGFI), "Amazing to see the world stand with the brave work you do!"
Other notable individuals that chipped in gratitude and support were Marc Nelson, Kiana Valenciano, Arci Muñoz and Eric "Eruption" Tai.
The DENR released a statement following DiCaprio's post that it would stand by its plan to cancel the 2017 memorandum of agreement by the government and the MGFI.
“We appreciate the statements of concern for the Philippine environment from international celebrities who are distinguished in their respective fields. However, no one is exempt from the law,” the DENR said in a statement, adding it will continues to take steps toward strengthening its compliance and enforcement capacities.
"The Filipino people own the area occupied by MGFI and the operation of resort venues that charge the public for day tours, meetings and weddings remains non-compliant with Philippine laws," the agency added. — with reports from Bella Cariaso

author: Terry Graedon
title: Show 1345: Secrets to Living a Long Healthy Life (Archive) | The People's Pharmacy
text: Secrets to Living a Long Healthy Life (Archive) Too many of us assume that aging automatically brings debility and cognitive decline. So it is a pleasure to talk with a centenarian who is ready to share the secrets to living a long healthy life. Secrets to Living a Long Healthy Life: Dr. Gladys McGarey is 102 years old. She spent her childhood in India because her parents were doctors caring for people in extremely remote, poor villages. An encounter with an elephant when she was nine years old clarified for her that healing should be her life’s work, too. The first and most important of her secrets for a satisfying life is that each of us can discover what our purpose is and pay attention to it. Needless to say, in a century of living, Dr. Gladys has seen a lot of changes. The practice of medicine has certainly not been stagnant. However, even in the 1970s, physicians Bill and Gladys McGarey and some of their colleagues recognized that they wanted a different way of practicing. That’s when they co-founded the American Holistic Medical Association, with its mission to tend to mind and spirit as well as to the patient’s body. She was later president of the organization, which is currently known as the Academy of Integrative Health and Medicine. Healing the whole being is different from simply killing pathogens, even though that may be needed at times. At other times, enlisting the patient’s inner healer is just as important. Finding Your Juice: Figuring out your purpose can be quite a challenge. Dr. Gladys recounts the story of a young man named James, who had recently graduated from college with a degree in computer science. Jim’s father, an engineer, was pleased with the prospect that his son would have steady employment, but Jim was not excited about it. He couldn’t figure out what to do with his life, but he thought a vision quest would help him figure it out. When his parents consulted Dr. Gladys, she endorsed that idea. The days he spent in the wilderness without food or water helped him realize that what he wanted and needed to do was create music. This was decades ago, and Jim is still making music, because that is where he found his “juice.” Following the Light: One of Dr. Gladys’ beautiful metaphors is to follow the light. She points out that life needs to move, and moving toward the light usually gives us the best results. She practices her own advice quite literally. Although she needs a walker to get around these days, she makes an effort to get in at least 3,800 steps a day with that walker. Her eyes are no longer strong enough for her to enjoy reading, but she listens to audio books. Instead of old age being a time of stagnation, she assures us that we can get better as we grow older. To accomplish that, we need to practice the five Ls: life, love, laughter, labor and listening. If we begin practicing now, we have a better chance of living a long, healthy life. This Week’s Guest: Gladys McGarey, MD, is still practicing at 102 years of age. Recognized as a pioneer of the allopathic and holistic medical movements, she is also a founding diplomat of the American Board of Holistic Medicine. She is the cofounder and past president of the American Holistic Medical Association, now called the Academy of Integrative Health and Medicine, as well as the co-founder of the Academy of Parapsychology and Medicine. Dr. McGarey currently has a medical consulting practice, maintains a healthy diet, and enjoys a good piece of cake every now and then. She is the author of [Living Medicine](https://www.amazon.com/Living-Medicine-Gladys-Taylor-McGarey/dp/1949001938/ref=sr_1_2?crid=3TUNQXFBI2KNV&keywords=Gladys+McGarey&qid=1686074258&s=books&sprefix=gladys+mcgarey%2Cstripbooks%2C138&sr=1-2). Her most recent book is [The Well-Lived Life: A 102-Year-Old Doctor’s Six Secrets to Health and Happiness at Every Age](https://www.amazon.com/Well-Lived-Life-102-Year-Old-Doctors-Happiness/dp/1668014483/ref=sr_1_1?crid=3TUNQXFBI2KNV&keywords=Gladys+McGarey&qid=1686074258&s=books&sprefix=gladys+mcgarey%2Cstripbooks%2C138&sr=1-1). Her website is [https://gladysmcgarey.com/](https://gladysmcgarey.com/) Listen to the Podcast: The podcast of this program will be available Monday, January 1, 2024, after broadcast on Dec. 30, 2023.
